data_event.label: Data Event
data_event.help: (Optional) The event type to listen to for sensor data. Default: data

message_event.label: Message Event
message_event.help: (Optional) The event type to listen to for messages. Default: messages

groupmessage_event.label: Group Message Event
groupmessage_event.help: (Optional) The event type to listen to for group messages. Default: groupmessages
